title: Pizza bianca with pancetta and apple
ingredients: ['Pizza dough', '1 teaspoon dried active yeast', '200ml warm water, divided', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '200g bread flour', '100g durum semolina', '1 scant tablespoon salt', 'Topping', '2 or 3 slices of pancetta or bacon medallions, cut into pieces', '300g mozzarella, cubed', '1 apple, cored and sliced in wedges']
